title: Tammy Hembrow puts on eye-popping display in a plunging white minidress
text:
She shocked her fans on Tuesday when she posted one of her raciest snaps yet, a picture of herself in a 'naked bikini'.

And on Wednesday, Tammy Hembrow put on an eye-popping display once again, this time as she doted on her two young children.

Taking to Instagram, the social media sensation slipped her figure into a plunging white mini dress as she enjoyed popsicles with her little ones.

One hot mama! Tammy Hembrow put on an eye-popping display in a plunging white mini dress as she enjoyed popsicles with her children on Wednesday

'Fresh fruit popsicles w (sic) my bestest lil (sic) fwenssss (sic),' Tammy captioned the post.

In the snap, she sits on the ground outside with daughter Saskia, three, and son Wolf, four, next to her.

They matched their mother by dressing in white.

Sweet: In the image, she is seen sitting on the ground with daughter Saskia, three, and son Wolf, four, next to her

Wow: It comes after Gold Coast-based Tammy shocked her fans on Tuesday when she posed wearing a 'naked bikini'

It comes after Gold Coast-based Tammy shocked her fans on Tuesday when she posed wearing a 'naked bikini.'

There was barely enough fabric cut in the Minimale Animal swimsuit to cover or contain the mother-of-two's famous curves.

The swimmers featured tiny g-string bottoms and a triangle-style top that covered just a slice of cleavage.

Her raciest post yet: There was barely enough fabric cut in the Minimale Animal swimsuit to cover or contain the mother-of-two's famous curves

Posing for the camera side on, Tammy made sure to flaunt her famous backside and buxom bust.

Tammy's fans were completely stunned by the images, with one asking the blonde bombshell: 'Are you trying to kill us?'

The Slender Rib suit retails for $135 USD and is available in five different colours.

Due to the design of the style, the item is not eligible for any type of returns.
description: She shocked her fans on Tuesday when she posted one of her raciest snaps yet, a picture of herself in a 'naked bikini'.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
